#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Position.

= Description =

The Position element gives the GPS coordinate of a point on the map of the Earth.


= Attributes =

None.


= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

None.


== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # lat - Latitude of the Position element.
 # lon - Longitude of the Position element.
 # alt - Altitude of the Position element.

Latitute and Longitude should be expressed in decimal value (no degrees, minutes, seconds) in the WGS84 Global Positioning System.
